translation_rules: padConcat({inventory_id, src_filename, map_sheet_id, orig_stand_id, ogc_fid}, {4,15,10,10,7}, {'x','x','x','x','x'}, '-', TRUE, TRUE)
description: Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID

validation_rules: hasCountOfNotNull({species_1_layer1, species_2_layer1, species_3_layer1, species_4_layer1, species_5_layer1, species_6_layer1}, {species_1_layer2, species_2_layer2, species_3_layer2, species_4_layer2, species_5_layer2, species_6_layer2}, 1, FALSE|NOT_APPLICABLE)
translation_rules: ifElseCountOfNotNullText({species_1_layer1, species_2_layer1, species_3_layer1, species_4_layer1, species_5_layer1, species_6_layer1}, {species_1_layer2, species_2_layer2, species_3_layer2, species_4_layer2, species_5_layer2, species_6_layer2}, 2, 1, 'SINGLE_LAYERED', 'MULTI_LAYERED')
description: Validation catches rows with no forest info and returns NOT_APPLICABLE. Translation runs countOfNotNull for the two forest layers. If one layer, returns SINGLE_LAYERED, if two layers returns MULTI_LAYERED.

validation_rules: vri01_hasCountOfNotNull({species_1_layer1, species_2_layer1, species_3_layer1, species_4_layer1, species_5_layer1, species_6_layer1}, {species_1_layer2, species_2_layer2, species_3_layer2, species_4_layer2, species_5_layer2, species_6_layer2}, inventory_standard_cd, land_cover_class_cd_1, bclcs_level_4, non_productive_descriptor_cd, non_veg_cover_type_1, 1, FALSE|-8886)
translation_rules: vri01_countOfNotNull({species_1_layer1, species_2_layer1, species_3_layer1, species_4_layer1, species_5_layer1, species_6_layer1}, {species_1_layer2, species_2_layer2, species_3_layer2, species_4_layer2, species_5_layer2, species_6_layer2}, inventory_standard_cd, land_cover_class_cd_1, bclcs_level_4, non_productive_descriptor_cd, non_veg_cover_type_1, 5)
description: Validation returns UNKNOWN_VALUE is NUM_OF_LAYERS is zero. Custom function counts number of layers based on the presence of a not null value for attributes representing each layer. Assumes valid LYR1 row must have species_cd_1 or species_cd_2 or species_cd_3 or species_cd_4 or species_cd_5 or species_cd_6. The custom function runs the NFL functions vri01_non_for_veg_validation, vri01_nat_non_veg_validation and vri01_non_for_anth_validation to see if there is an nfl value present based on the input values. If there is, one layer is added to the count.
Converts source area from m2 to ha. Return OUT_OF_RANGE for any zero values.
